Bayern Munich: the tracks to replace Niko Kovac




Chelsea is in a good period. With his young players (Mount, Abraham, etc.), Frank Lampard does a good job. But it would like to try the coup Timo Werner, the striker of RB Leipzig.




Chelsea wants Timo Werner to come




Timo Werner + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Chelsea would like from January to attach the services of Timo Werner, current serial scorer of RB Leipzig. The deal could turn around 150 million pounds, according to the Express. The 23-year-old German striker has just extended his lease with Leipzig.
